alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 3:57PM AKST until December 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM FRIDAY TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY FROM KING SALMON NORTH... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay from King Salmon north. * WHEN...From 9 PM Friday to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warm front will cross Bristol Bay Friday evening bringing a band of mixed precipitation inland. Snow will fall with the front initially before quickly mixing with or changing over to freezing rain overnight on Friday. Areas north and west of Dillingham and King Salmon are expected to see the highest ice accumulations, with wintry mix quickly switching to rain near the coast on Friday evening. Warming temperatures will switch precipitation over to all rain from southwest to northeast by Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
